answerText: meniscuses [or menisci][10] Meniscuses are caused by this physical phenomenon, which also allows bugs like water striders to walk on water.
heading: MUT |2015 | 5 | 6 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The Kelvin equation gives the effect of one of these things with radius R on the vapor pressure. [10] Name these manifestations of capillary action. The one produced by mercury is convex because mercury atoms are more attracted to each other than to the walls of a glass container.
